column4: plz can anyone help? i set up a partition /data during install and it's mounted as root, only read access to user. how do i change this so my main (only) user can have rw access?
wouldn't i want to change it in /etc/fstab?
what filesytem? if ext2/3/4 you need to chown/chmod the mountpoint after its mounted.. or chmod/chown dirs on the FS. for the user to have full rights to it
i always make a subdir on my 'data' filesystems - one for each user. and chown/chmod that dir for them
